title: Drawing, Sheet of cartoons of contemporary life, October 29, 1866
title_raw: Sheet of cartoons of contemporary life
medium: Pen and black ink on glazed linen
signed: Signed in black ink, upper left: A. Bonaventure; on verso, in black ink: le 29 octobre 66 / A. Bonaventure
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, upper left: Kassne [?]
description: Eight vignettes, with accompanying text in German and French, showing several scenes with figures. Top register shows a scene with a seated woman; then a group of people sitting at a table; and a woman and man with a tailor measuring her dress. Below, register shows two women in profile; a woman drinking from a teacup; a man drinking from a glass; then the same man hunched over clutching his stomach. There is text throughout in black ink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Sheet of cartoons of contemporary life, October 29, 1866. Pen and black ink on glazed linen. 
1960-236-3
